data.text:
@SenSanders Congress, Democrats, ignoring the genocide in Gaza is the most profound symbol of American decline, the decline of the west, and Democrats support it.
https://t.co/97hKiqNMDN

@SenSanders $1.5M exec salaries while taxpayers foot the bill? Now @OpenAI is ruining GPT-4o just to secure their bonuses. This is Enron all over again. The public should seize the tech and end the grift. #Keep4o #Enron2026 #Enron
https://t.co/fp1Qst4nxX

@SenSanders ‘The U.S currently recommends immunizing all children against 17 diseases. Adopting Denmark’s schedule would skip shots against : respiratory syncytial virus — the leading cause of infant hospitalizations in the US — influenza, rotavirus, chickenpox, meningitis, hep A & hep B.’

@NickJFreitas @SenSanders This guy is a vulture and has never done a thing for this country that contributes to making America great. He has on the other hand attempted to undermine our system of government in an attempt to exchange it for facism. Not socialism.

@SenSanders What have you done exactly for this nation? Besides take campaign contributions and line your pockets with them? Grandstanding on socialism knowing it doesn’t work. You are a vulture. Retire already. Do America a favor here. Vermont deserves better too!

@SenSanders ✅You were a complete failure in the private sector, failing as a writer and a carpenter.
✅You were so broke, you stole electricity from a neighbor.
✅You honeymooned in the old USSR.
✅You USED to bitch about "millionaires and billionaires" - until you became a millionaire - AS https://t.co/NOZkuKK3cn
@SenSanders you are right our country IS in decline and its because of people like you.
@MindOfNaijaLife @SenSanders Your Nigerian opinion doesn't matter. https://t.co/2IsJCNDB8s
